nodes.bodyText:
instead of making a public @ExpectedFFDCs annotation, lets use a package-protected annotation as an inner class as described in this article:
https://dzone.com/articles/repeatable-annotations-in-java-8-1
That way users won't accidentally import/use @ExpectedFFDCs
